title: Ep 84 | Phil-osophy, What Socrates & Plato Didn't Know, Atheism & Why Jase Shot His Rubik's Cube
description:
Phil imagines the reaction to his worldview if he, Jase, and Al were dropped into ancient Greece before the birth of Christ. Al and Jase point out what we have in common with ancient Greek culture. Phil notices something curious about atheists who embrace the great philosophers. And the guys discuss Phil's pet raccoon, the Village People, how Jase uses sin and death as conversation starters, and the time Jase shot his Rubik's Cube.
